author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia's Gazprom says sees gas price in Europe at around $230 per 1,000 cm in 2018
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian gas giant Gazprom said on Friday that it sees its gas price for Europe at around $230 per 1,000 cubic meters in 2018.
The company added that a legal dispute with Ukraine was reflected in reserves of 213 billion roubles ($3.41 billion) in its financial report for the last year.
($1 = 62.4050 roubles)
